function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate follow-up period after coating application","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and manipulation of virus samples may lead to accidental exposure and transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient accessibility to nature-related features and spaces, limiting the potential health benefits of biophilic design.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider the impact of biophilic design on airborne disease transmission and contagion within the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to nature and natural elements in the built environment may lead to a lack of biophilic connections and reduced well-being.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of greenery maintenance may lead to the accumulation of allergens, pests, and pathogens, contributing to health hazards.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of validation for the effectiveness of biophilic design in buildings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of financial matters and building technology in biophilic architecture","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited evaluation criteria for non-physical architectural themes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of specific user groups in biophilic design may lead to inadequate health and well-being outcomes for certain individuals.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate quantification of exposure time to nature and contact frequency may result in suboptimal biophilic design outcomes.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of scientific substantiation and quantitative evaluation in biophilic architecture may lead to unverified design concepts and ineffective implementation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insect troubles and odour issues caused by plants in architecture","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for air quality in biophilic design may lead to the spread of airborne diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration for the selection of indigenous plant species may disrupt the local ecosystem and increase the risk of invasive species and diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of ’nature’ into buildings may create conditions for the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of diversity in biophilic design practices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of integration of subfields in architectural research","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Contested and ambiguous notion of ’nature’ in biophilic design","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of culture and context leading to inappropriate information or abuse","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"A sense of loss evoked when designs change negatively or are demolished","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complex architectural shapes requiring higher budgets","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inevitable human error in mimicking nature may cause an unbalanced system","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap and repetition of biophilic design elements","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and air quality control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for the density and spatial distribution of points of interest pois in pandemic-related research","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift in urban commute patterns away from public transit towards other modes of transportation , biking, walking, private vehicles .","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in urban activities and points of interest pois in response to pandemic risk and associated policies.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insignificance of population density on infection rate and negative effects on the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of uv light devices for surface disinfection may not reach all surfaces or provide consistent coverage, leading to incomplete disinfection.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on manufacturing and socioeconomic functions, leading to increased need for remote operation and maintenance.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of non-pharmaceutical interventions npis in building wellness strategies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential contamination during rna extraction process","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential presence of sars-cov-2 in unfiltered sewage samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 signal in peg-precipitated filtrate fraction","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of wastewater collection samples with sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wastewater testing to detect population-level prevalence of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High prevalence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater samples indicating potential community spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in viral signal degradation during storage at 4°c","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in pmmov levels across samples with a standard deviation of 1.34 c t units","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Testing viral enrichment process in sewage samples can pose a risk of exposure to viral contaminants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling sewage samples without proper pasteurization increases the risk of exposure to live viruses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing and quantifying viral titers in wastewater samples involves the risk of accidental exposure to sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive signal for sars-cov-2 in wastewater samples indicates viral presence.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of sars-cov-2 genetic material in sewage poses a risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to testing for sars-cov-2 in the united states","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of non-peer-reviewed data for clinical practice may result in incorrect or harmful medical decisions.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customization of dashboards and tracking of other countries may lead to biased data analysis or reporting, misrepresenting the true state of the outbreak.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exponential growth of cases in multiple countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
